selected_quotes: Good info on #H5N8 in wild birds poultry in Germany by Anne Pohlmann, Martin Beer colleagues at FLI
Reassorted Influenza A(H5N8) Clade 2.3.4.4 Viruses, Germany,
Outbreaks among Wild Birds and Domestic Poultry Caused by Reassorted Influenza A(H5N8) Viruses, Germany, 2016
Outbreaks among Wild #Birds and Domestic Poultry Caused by Reassorted #Influenza A(H5N8), Germany.
Outbreaks among Wild Birds and Domestic Poultry Caused by Reassorted Influenza A(H5N8) 2.3.4.4 Viruses, Germany,2016

citation.abstract: In November 2016, an influenza A(H5N8) outbreak caused deaths of wild birds and domestic poultry in Germany. Clade 2.3.4.4 virus was closely related to viruses at the Russia-Mongolia border in 2016 but had new polymerase acidic and nucleoprotein segments. These new strains may be more efficiently transmitted to and shed by birds.
citation.title: Outbreaks among Wild Birds and Domestic Poultry Caused by Reassorted Influenza A(H5N8) Clade 2.3.4.4 Viruses, Germany, 2016
